thread.title: Run-down and uninviting
thread.title_full: Run-down and uninviting - Review of France Louvre, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: elber2
title: Run-down and uninviting
text:
Rooms are old and poorly maintaned, and altogether uninviting. Carpets are stained, bathroom tiles cracked. The bed at least was decent.
While there's an effort to provide amenties such as coffee in the room, and there is working wifi, the hotel's 3-star rating is out of place.
The location in central Paris is good. But unless Paris is fully booked out, there is no reason to ever consider this hotel. You'll get much better, fresher, newer places for the same price.
Room Tip: Good room? Choose another hotel... See more room tips
